column5: Tied some early spring nymphs,#14. They are not perfect I know.  I need to get that light magnifier.
They look pretty darn good Brian. Nothing in nature is perfect............

Geese Brian here I’m thinking a smaller Toon! Size does matter! I saw more fish this week than in Simcoe in years. These were coulerful and fast, some were eel dinner. It was about 24 inches. got home and driveway had melted and clean! Missed the crap by a week!
I think I ,ll tie the runt one on John. They will think it,s easy prey. LOL Thanks,  Welcome back my friend.
They look great I tried some years ago to do some flies I just couldn't do them
Thanks B ,  glad to  be back, well not really but,  Canada is. Home.
shoot. Thought you were going to a smaller home and giving away some fishing stuff....flies look nice tho
